newsitem.title: UK: FORECAST - Consensus on UK company results.
newsitem.headline: FORECAST - Consensus on UK company results.

text.p: Analysts' estimates of UK company results expected in week ending November 29 include -
** The British Gas figures are for net historic income.
*** In the year covered by the Royal Bank of Scotland
forecasts the group posted extraordinary income of around
70.0 million stg from the disposal of CC Holdings and
a restructuring charge of around $35.0 million
**** In the period covered by the United Utilities forecasts
the company registered extraordinary income from disposals.
All profit figures are pretax, exclude exceptional items
unless otherwise stated and are in millions stg. Dividends
are total net and quoted as pence per share.
